features: [Space-Saving and Roomy] This bathroom storage cabinet boasts plentiful storage space while occupying a mere 11.8" x 23.6" of floor area, making it an excellent solution to optimize your limited bathroom space

[Sturdy and Stable] Made with premium MDF, this freestanding bathroom cabinet is sturdy enough to withstand the test of time. The included anti-tip kit secures the cabinet to the wall for added stability and safety

[Attractive Accent for Any Space] The classic white color, minimalist design, and unique shutter doors make this floor cabinet a fashionable complement to any room's decor, be it the bathroom, living room, or entryway
[Easy to Clean] The smooth surface of this freestanding bathroom floor cabinet makes it easy to wipe clean with just a damp cloth, saving you time and effort on daily maintenance
[Hassle-Free Assembly] This bathroom cabinet comes with labeled parts and easy-to-follow instructions, making assembly a breeze and allowing you to start organizing your bathroom right away

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Quality Hinges Robust and durable—you can use this bathroom storage cabinet for years to come. Easy to Clean The smooth surface of the bathroom cabinet is easy to wipe clean with a damp cloth. Chrome-Plated Knobs Add a touch of glamor to the cabinet and make the doors easy to open.

Multiple Storage Options: Arrange your lotions and bath bombs on the open shelf for easy access, store your cleaning supplies on the adjustable shelf inside the cupboard, which has 3 height options, and set a tray of scented candles on top to create a relaxing and romantic ambiance in your bathroom All Around the House: This isn't just only for the bathroom, as it can be placed in the kitchen to store pots and pans, in the living room for books and picture frames, or in the entryway to hold out-the-door essentials like keys and purses! Specifications: Color: WhiteMaterial: MDF (Medium Density Fiberboard)Product Size: 11.8"D x 23.6"W x 31.5"H (30 x 60 x 80 cm)Product Weight: 27.9 lb (12.7 kg)Max. Static Load Capacity of the Tabletop: 110 lb (50 kg)Max. Static Load Capacity of the Adjustable Shelf: 33 lb (15 kg) Package Contents: 1 x Bathroom Cabinet1 x Anti-Tip Kit1 x Accessory Kit1 x Instructions VASAGLE Notes: Children are not allowed to climb on or play with the storage cabinet.For safety, be sure to secure the floor cabinet to the wall with the included anti-tip kit.Do not expose the storage unit to water for extended periods of time to avoid cracking and deformation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NICE ADDITION TO OUR SMALL GUEST BATHROOM
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this cabinet to provide a little more storage space in our guest bathroom and it turned out to be just right. This is obviously not expensive furniture. It is a good looking, inexpensive solution. For anyone who has experience assembling Ikea type furniture, and if you follow the illustrated directions VERY carefully, assembly is not difficult. For others, it might be best to get the help of a handyman. I was able to put the cabinet together in about an hour and a half with only a couple of minor mistakes that I had to go back and re-do. Each part is clearly marked and I could have avoided my mistakes by paying just a little more attention! In my case, I may be too experienced, so I got careless! When assembling, be careful not to over tighten anything and you'll wind up with a decent, sturdy cabinet. All the parts fit together perfectly, as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Size Cabinet
reviews.reviewText: Needed a small cabinet for my laundry room to store rags and laundry bags. This was the perfect size and easy to assemble. Drawer was added bonus. So far it's held up well and top is nice for putting my gym bag on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and acceptable quality.
reviews.reviewText: So far it's great. I changed the knobs to match our existing bathroom vanity knobs but the ones that came with it were good quality as well. I ended up using the screws that came with it for the knobs still (because the screws that came with my square one were too long). Everything went together smoothly and lined up. I personally am not a fan of the cam lock fastening system, especially for furniture, but these one fit nice and tight in the holes and actually grip lock around the screw. The whole cabinet assembled is kind of wobbly (lightweight) when you open and close the drawer and it does come with a wall anchor system, which I'm sure works fine, but I clean too often and move stuff around to have this particular little stand anchored down. I just got it for somewhere to have the toilet paper and such nearby and it matches the larger storage cabinet that I have coming for in the bathroom as well so it was really a win win all around.The only things I noticed wrong was what looked like a crack that was painted over during manufacturing. There's no blemishes anywhere else so I think it may just be part of the last later of wood (or whatever it is it's made of) that peeled up in the factory before it was painted. It didn't effect the use of it at all and honestly I had to really look for it when I went back to take a picture of it. Also, the little magnet on the door could be just a little bit stronger, I get the bigger rolls of toilet paper and had to stack them (as pictured) to get the magnet to think about holding the door closed. It would fit 4 stacks of 3 high per shelf if the magnets were stronger.It arrived a day early and was worth the money I'd say. It does look nice and a bit bigger I guess than I expected, which isn't a bad thing. It fits nicely between the door and the toilet without being in the way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It looks great! It’s very sturdy and functional
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love how this looks in my bathroom! Once I took a breath and grasped the flow of the instructions it came together quite easily. It was actually quite meditative and very satisfying to complete! I did it by myself. 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicer than I thought
reviews.reviewText: This was easy enough to build and looks great in my bathroom. I needed something to display towels and organize/hide toiletries. It’s just big enough for what I needed.One piece was missing in the box, but the seller sent it to me so I was able to build it eventually!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a value!
reviews.reviewText: The cabinet came nicely packed with good assembly instructions. My husband said it was a breeze to put together. It is sturdy and well made - looks great with a little lamp next to the toilet in the bathroom water closet. Big enough to hold LOTs of toilet paper, air spray, toilet bowl cleaner, etc. so that non of that stuff has to sit out in view. I can't believe that they can produce, package, and ship this cabinet for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Put Together
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually write reviews and I NEVER put together furniture so this is a testament to this product. I am a 68 y/o woman with no carpentry skills. My DH always took care of these projects but he is currently incapacitated. We needed a small cabinet to add storage in the bathroom and the dimensions on this one fit the bill. Knowing I would have to put it together, before ordering I went through the listing till I found the manual and I read through the whole thing. Here is what makes this item easy to put together: each piece is tagged with a letter. Each piece of hardware is marked with a letter. The manual is pictures only. No written instructions. But it shows you which piece to put where and how to use each piece of hardware. Technically the only tool needed is a phillips head screwdriver. I needed a small set of pliers to facilitate turning screws as I have alot of arthritis in my hands. Everything went in fine, to my amazement. It took me awhile because I dragged my feet but basically the directions were easy to follow and everything was there. It is actually pretty sturdy, good looking and will hold tons of toilet paper. I highly recommend the product and I would assume any cabinet put out by these people would be just as easy to put together. PS: I did have another cabinet put together by my husband years ago to look at as reference for things like which way do the hinges go, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: The instruction was very good. They packed a few extra parts (no I installed all the proper hardware). Sturdy and fit perfectly where we wanted it. Very well made.
The media could not be loaded. De muy buena calidad, resistente, muy bonito.
It took a bit to put it together - but it looks nice and the parts fit well and easily together.
I like that it is not too wide as my bathroom is quite small. It fits in exactly in the spot I wanted it and adds something special to the bathroom along with extra storage.

This is a lovely, sturdy cabinet. I put it together myself. Would have been nice to have a second set of hands to help hang the doors, but I managed. The pieces were well labeled and the instructions clear. There were two spare pieces of some of the screws, dowels etc.. I am extremely pleased with my purchase. Much nicer than I thought it would be.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to put together, great stand for front door
reviews.reviewText: Despite it being meant for bathroom, this makes for a great front door storage unit.Keeps all our dog clothes/leashes etc in the cupboard. Two shelves for shoes.We put down some vinyl shelf paper to avoid wet shoes making a mess.Definitely easy to assemble and looks great. Very sturdy. We did not use the anchor to the wall, as it was sturdy enough not to tip over.
